title: More data limitations on policy priorities

content.question: The data in the chart is too limited to support which of the following generalizations?

choices.label: Democrats believe the environment is a more important policy priority than terrorism.
Republicans believe the economy is a priority for state governments rather than the federal government.
Most Democrats believe the federal government needs to take action to reduce crime.
There is a relatively wide partisan gap on whether the military should be a top priority.

content.answer: Republicans believe the economy is a priority for state governments rather than the federal government.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain possible limitations of the data provided.
